title: 94/863/EC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1994 approving the programme concerning infectious hematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia in certain geographical zones, submitted by France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 December 1994 approving the programme concerning infectious hematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia in certain geographical zones, submitted by France (Only the French text is authentic) (94/863/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The control programme for IHN and VHS in the geographical zones referred to in the Annex submitted by France, is hereby approved.
France shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with the programmes referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 46, 19. 2. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 175, 19. 7. 1993, p. 34.
ANNEX
- Les Forges,
- La Nive and les Nivelles,
- L'Élorn.
